question: Which among the following is true regarding cyclones?
option1: rotate counter clockwise in the Northern Hemisphere and clockwise in the Southern Hemisphere
option2: rotate clockwise in the Northern Hemisphere and counter clockwise in the Southern Hemisphere
option3: may rotate in any direction in any hemisphere
answer: rotate counter clockwise in the Northern Hemisphere and clockwise in the Southern Hemisphere
explanation: For cyclones: Pressure Condition at the centre: Low Pattern of wind direction in Northern hemisphere: Anti-clock wise Pattern of wind direction in Southern hemisphere: Clock wise For Anti cyclones: Pressure Condition at the centre: high Pattern of wind direction in Northern hemisphere: clock wise Pattern of wind direction in Southern hemisphere: Anti clock wise
